page.title: 20Authors
page.content:
This area was surveyed by pupils from Sion Hill Middle School, Kidderminster. The school has 400 pupils aged from 9 to 13. Some of the pupils live in our survey area and went to Blakedown First School. When children reach the age of 13, they transfer to Wolverley High School or one of the other local High Schools. The teachers in charge of the project were Mrs Hoskins and Mr Durant.
The main contributions came from ; Rachel Allan, Andrea Caplan, Joanna Deakin, Joanna Downing, Bridgette Dyer, Simon Freeman, Mark Humphreys, Emily Johns, Philip Mantom, Pamela Pheysey, Julie Pitt, Emma Rogers, Carolyn Vaccaro and Kathryn Wilkes
Good wishes to all our readers !
